Use Array#reduce to implement a function that takes an
Array and a Function, and applies the function to each
item in the Array.

i.e. Use Array#reduce to implement Array#map.

Injected Variables:

* $input will be some arbitrary Array.
* $operation will be some arbitrary Function.

Resources:
* https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reduce_(higher-order_function)
* https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/Reduce

#################
## Boilerplate ##
#################

```js

function map(arr, fn) {
  // SOLUTION GOES HERE
}

// do not edit below this line

console.log(map($input, $operation))

```
